name: Tank Racing!
description:
Tanks, racing in 3D! Race around the track, speed past your competition with a big boost, and even shoot other racers to stun them in their tracks! 

Up to four players can play, but two are recommended as more than two players can potentially cause a glitch that will mess with and switch inputs for players. Two players runs absolutely fine. This games does require Xbox360 or XboxOne controllers to play for the most enjoyment.

This is a midterm project for Columbia College Chicago's Advanced Game Engine Scripting course. Any assets used were used for educational purposes only.
